com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.layout

Class UIManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.layout.UIManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PropertyChangeListener, EventListener

    public final class UIManager
extends Object
implements PropertyChangeListener
    The UIManager provides a mechanism for client applications to use different Renderers, without having to specify a renderer on a per-component basis. Renderers are assigned in the following order of preference:
    1. An application-specific renderer for the component. This is configured using application parameters, e.g. for a WText component a Renderer would be specified as: bordertech.wcomponents.UIManager.renderer.com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.WText=com.github.myApp.render.MyTextRenderer
    2. A package implementation for the component, for the current RenderContext in use. This is controlled by the RenderContext.getRenderPackage() method, which specifies the package name. The UIManager expects that each renderer package includes a RendererFactory implementation which knows how to create a specific renderer for a component. The RendererFactory class for each package must be named "RendererFactory".
    3. As for the first two options, but for the class's parent class (then grand-parent etc., repeated until the WComponent class is reached).
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Yiannis Paschalidis

      • getRenderer

        public static Renderer getRenderer(WComponent component,
                   RenderContext context)
        Retrieves a renderer which can renderer the given component to the context.
        Parameters:
        component - the component to retrieve the renderer for.
        context - the render context.
        Returns:
        an appropriate renderer for the component and context, or null if a suitable renderer could not be found.

      • getTemplateRenderer

        @Deprecated
public static Renderer getTemplateRenderer(RenderContext context)
        Deprecated. Use WTemplate instead.
        Retrieves a renderer which can renderer templates for the given context.
        Parameters:
        context - the render context.
        Returns:
        an appropriate renderer for the component and context, or null if a suitable renderer could not be found.

      • getDefaultRenderer

        @Deprecated
public static Renderer getDefaultRenderer(WComponent component)
        Deprecated. use getRenderer(WComponent, RenderContext).
        Retrieves the default LayoutManager for the given component. This method must no longer be used, as it will only ever return a web-xml renderer.
        Parameters:
        component - the component.
        Returns:
        the LayoutManager for the given component.
